fever.advice: Take rest, drink plenty of fluids, and monitor your temperature. You can take paracetamol if needed.
recommendations: Consult doctor if fever persists for more than 3 days

headache.advice: Rest in a quiet, dark room. Apply a cold compress to your forehead and stay hydrated.
recommendations: Avoid bright lights and loud sounds

cough.advice: Stay hydrated, use honey for throat soothing, and avoid irritants like smoke.
recommendations: Consult doctor if cough persists for more than 2 weeks

stomach_pain.advice: Eat light foods, avoid spicy or fatty foods, and drink warm water.
recommendations: Eat bland foods like rice, toast
Consult doctor if pain is severe or persists

chest_pain.advice: This could be serious. Please seek immediate medical attention.

shortness_of_breath.advice: This requires immediate medical attention. Please consult a doctor or go to the emergency room.
recommendations: Sit upright and try to stay calm

cold.advice: Rest, drink warm fluids, and use saline nasal drops. Symptoms usually resolve in 7-10 days.

fatigue.advice: Ensure adequate sleep, maintain a healthy diet, and stay hydrated.

dizziness.advice: Sit or lie down immediately, stay hydrated, and avoid sudden movements.

rash.advice: Keep the area clean and dry, avoid scratching, and use gentle moisturizers.
recommendations: Consult doctor if rash spreads or worsens
